DOC.brief_summary: All patients undergoing laparoscopic visceral and gynecologic procedures using the combined bipolar and ultrasonic vessel sealing and dissection device Thunderbeat are entered in a prospective registry. Data will be analysed concerning the safe use of the instrument and perioperative blood loss.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Evaluation of the Use of Thunderbeat Vessel Sealing Device in Laparoscopic Surgery
DOC.criteria: all patients undergoing laparoscopic visceral or gynecologic surgery need for a vessel sealing device during surgery non able to understand informed consent or missing consent age <18
